earth_description.remarks: Reopened in 2022, extending to the north. Loci 28 and 30 underneath were merged with 26 because they are all tumble.

supervisor: K. Burrell, C. Tyson; M. Apffel
designation:
Rocky “tumble” beneath loci 2 & 4
2022: merged this with the two loci underneath, loci 28 and 30.

pails.pottery_comments: 7 bones or bone fragments in this pail.

artifacts.remarks:
Large quern that will remain on-site. A soil sample (#52) was taken from underneath it once it was turned upright.

GPS ID: B22.0652
